50.name: Summon Noble Energy I (A)
50.Description: Summons a holy spirit near you. This spirit does not move from the summoned spot, and inflicts 1890 long-range fire damage to a selected target within a 30m radius. This spirit vanishes after a while and consumes its HP with each attack.

45.name: Chain of Suffering I
45.Description: Inflicts 532 earth damage to a target within a 25m radius, and deals additional 507 damage every 12s for 2m. In addition, reduces the target's Magic Resistance by 400. If the target dies while the skill is in effect, it is resurrected at its registered Kisk or Obelisk.

45.Description: Stigma skill of an Ancient Daeva. Recovers the HP of a target within a 25m radius of you and that of up to 6 allies within a 25m radius of the target by 1154, and forms a protective shield for 10s that can block 1156 damage each time, up to 1156 damage, whenever you receive attack.
